channel.title: *sigh*.....how do i fix this package error
channel.description: when i try to make a minigame it says client.java:10: class, interface, or enum expected package org.dementhium.content.minigames.zombies; ^ 1 error You have sucsessfully compiled Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: *sigh*.....how do i fix this package error
item.dc:creator: @chromeblade0 chromeblade0
item.description:
@chromeblade0 wrote:

youu know what i dont even have that path and i dont know how to edit it if you can help great if not then owell thanks for your help anyway

item.title: *sigh*.....how do i fix this package error
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

chromeblade0:

yeeah i think thats my problem i dont think i have a directory how would i add that and i apreciate all you help

do you have a file named ‘minigames’ in the path ./org/demnithum/content/ ? if not, make one there.

item.title: *sigh*.....how do i fix this package error
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

chromeblade0:

i got the same error shoulr there be a minigame file? i made a blank text file called minigame?

there should just be a directory called ‘minigames’. Putting the astrix (*) calls all the files in that directory.

Read full topic

item.title: *sigh*.....how do i fix this package error
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

change this line:

 package org.dementhium.content.minigames.zombies;

to this:

 package org.dementhium.content.minigames.*;

Read full topic
